thread.title: Kurt Russell action figure reveals look of ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ character
thread.title_full: Kurt Russell action figure reveals look of ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ character

author: Clark Collis
title: Kurt Russell action figure reveals look of ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ character
text:
Email Marvel/Hasbro 
What will Kurt Russell’s character Ego the Living Planet look like in the upcoming Marvel superhero sequel Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 ? The answer became public knowledge this weekend when the company Entertainment Earth unveiled Hasbro’s Star-Lord and Ego Action Figures 2-Pack at the Toy Fair in New York City. 
In addition to being a planet, Russell’s character is also, of course, the father of Chris Pratt’s Peter Quill. The two action figures are part of the Marvel Legends Series and will go sale in August. 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 costars Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper, Michael Rooker, Karen Gillan, Pom Klementieff, and Elizabeth Debicki. 
You can see the action figures of Ego the Living Planet and Star-Lord, below. Marvel/Hasbro 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 hits theaters May 5. Show Full Article
